name: King Gorilla Jungle 3D
description:
King Gorilla Jungle 3D is 3d simulation game, play as African smartest species like chimpanzees. Explore a massive world full of dangerous animals and carnivores. Danger is at every turn in the wild. Play smart and attack wisely. Gain experience and boost skills to hunt deathly or weaker animals. Deliver killer blows by leaping, pouncing and ambushing enemy prey.
Features:

-Challenging 10 missions to survive against wild predators
-Stunning 3D graphics with superb jungle locations
-Real life gorilla animations for jumping, roars, pumping chest, smashing objects and more
-Wild animals animations with artificial intelligence for saving life and running away
-Awesome HD graphics
